root.name: Jottobots
root.description: OveriviewJottobots is a downloadable 2D action-adventure platformer containing a constantly counting down clock; if the clock reaches 0, the game is over - however, extra time can be found within the environment. The game was developed by Kyle Pulver, with visuals by J. Otto Seibold, and music from Josh Whelchel. Currently, the game is only available for PC via the Humble Store for $1.System RequirementsCPU: Intel Core2Duo 2.4GhzGPU: nVidia 8800GTS (or better)
